info.name: ReportVerse API
info.description: Collection for testing the ReportVerse backend API endpoints

item.name: Authentication

request.description: Register a new mentor account (temporary endpoint for development)
Login as a mentor user to get authentication token
Login as a mentee user to get authentication token
Register a new mentee (accessible only to mentors)
Get current mentor user details
Get current mentee user details

item.description: Authentication endpoints for login and user management

request.description: Create a new profile for the mentee
Update existing profile for the mentee
Get mentee's profile details
Report a new issue
Get all issues reported by the mentee

variable.description: ID of the issue to retrieve

request.description: Get details of a specific issue

item.name: Academics

request.description: Add or update academic details
Get mentee's academic details

item.description: Endpoints for mentee academic record management

request.description: Report a new achievement
Get all achievements reported by the mentee
Get dashboard overview data for mentee
Get a list of all mentees assigned to the mentor
Get the profile details of a specific mentee
Get the academic details of a specific mentee
Get all achievements of a specific mentee

item.name: Issues

request.description: Get all issues reported by assigned mentees
Get details of a specific issue
Add a comment to an issue and optionally update its status

item.description: Endpoints for managing issues reported by mentees

item.name: Achievements

request.description: Get all achievements reported by assigned mentees
Filter achievements by type
Filter achievements by position
Sort achievements by date (ascending order)

item.description: Endpoints for managing achievements reported by mentees
